# Action needed: We can't process your request for a Board Appeal

Dear <redacted>,

You submitted your request for a Board Appeal (VA Form 10182), but we had a problem with our system. We couldn't process your form. We're sorry about this.

## What to do next
You'll need to submit your form again. We recommend you submit your form again by mail, in person, or by fax.

You'll need to download and fill out a Decision Review Request: Board Appeal (Notice of Disagreement) (VA Form 10182).

(action-link)[Get VA Form 10182 to download](https://www.va.gov/find-forms/about-form-10182/)

### Option 1: By mail
Mail the completed form to this address:

(address)Board of Veterans' Appeals | PO Box 27063 | Washington, D.C. 20038

### Option 2: In person
Bring the completed form to a VA regional office.
[Find a VA regional office near you](https://www.va.gov/find-locations/)

**Note:** You can ask a VA regional office for copies of the forms to fill out. Or call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711) to request forms. We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

### Option 3: By fax
Fax your form to 844-678-8979.

> ## Submission Details
> ### Form submitted
> **Decision Reviews Request: Board Appeal (Notice of Disagreement)**
> VA Form VA10182
>
> ### Date submitted
> <redacted>


## What to do if you have questions
Call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711). We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.
Thank you

Thank you

<hr>

You're receiving this email because you submitted a form on [VA.gov](http://www.va.gov). Don't reply to this email.
